title: Ivan Kaakhi Sattai Lyrics Motta Shiva Ketta Shiva
stanzas:
Ivan Kaakhi Sattai Lyrics Motta Shiva Ketta Shiva
#Amrish

Ivan kaakhi satta fireu
avan kanna paaru poweru
emartharman veettu kayiru
ivan kayyil edhire uyiru

real real ivan
real hero thaandaa
saayal saayal
ivan saayal puyalthaan(2)

ivanai vellathaan
ada unnaal mudiyaadhu
kaatrai vettathaan
oru kaththi kidaiyadhu

ennoda idhamenna
edhirithaan theermaanippaan
eppodhum yutham vandhaal
ivanethaan munne nippaan

vaalaatta evan vandhalum
veppendaa aappu.
thalai keezha pidichalum
neethaanda toppu

real real ivan
real hero thaandaa
saayal saayal
ivan saayal puyalthaan(2)

ovvoru kadavul kaiyyil
vevvaeru aayidham undu
andhandha aayidham ellam
motham ivan kayyil undu

sikkalthaan undhan pakkam
makkalthaan endhan pakkam
idhuvaraikkum trailer paatha
inimethaan yekka shakkam

yemanoda kootaali naan
ellaame dhoolu.
naanthaanda manitha singam
climax-il paaru.

real real ivan
real hero thaandaa
saayal saayal
ivan saayal puyalthaan(2)

avan kanna paaru poweru

ivan kayyil edhire uyiru
